data.title: Programming with C and C++
data.course_desc:
Build a strong programming foundation by learning Internshala Trainings' Programming with C and C++. They remain two of the most popular programming languages in use today and have laid the foundation for many other languages. These languages are great options for starting your coding journey.

Course Highlights
-Learn online, at your own schedule
-Mobile friendly - No laptop? No problem
-Placement assistance to build your career
-Certificate of training from Internshala Trainings
-3 projects for hands-on practice
-Doubt clearing through Q&A forum
-Beginner friendly- No prior knowledge required
-8 weeks duration- 1 hr/day (flexible schedule)
-Downloadable content with lifetime access

What placement assistance will you receive?
1. Free Placement Prep Training: Learn how to build your resume, make great applications, and ace your interviews.
2. Curated internships & jobs: Get internships and fresher jobs as per your preference in your inbox.
3. Get highlighted on Internshala: Top performers will be highlighted in their internship & job applications on Internshala.

Why Learn Programming with C and C++?
1. C/C++ powers the world: Whether it be operatings systems like Windows, web browsers like Chrome, or game engines like Unity 3D, C/C++ is everywhere!
2. Beginner friendly: Due to the straightforwardness of the language, it serves as a solid introduction to programming for any beginner.
3. Lucrative salary: The average salary of a C++ developer is 5.4 LPA according to Glassdoor.

How will your training work?
1. Learn concepts: Go through training videos to learn concepts
2. Test yourself: Test your knowledge through quizzes & module tests at regular intervals
3. Hands-on practice: Work on assignments and projects. Use our in-browser IDE for coding practice
4. 1:1 doubt solving: Get your doubts solved by experts through Q&A forum within 24 hours
5. Take final exam: Complete your training by taking the final exam
6. Get certified: Get certified in Web Development upon successful completion of training

data.title: Become a Certified Web Developer from Scratch
data.course_desc:
In this course, we will discuss the various components of a web application,
including the front end, back end, APIs, and databases. We will start by learning the basics of front-end development, learning about HTML and CSS, as well as modern frameworks for design such as Bootstrap. Next, we will move to the backend to learn about JavaScript, as well as API and server frameworks such as Node.js and Express. Finally, we will look at tools like React, as well as database storage methods like Mongo DB and MySQL.
By the end of this course, you will feel comfortable with all aspects of front and back-end development.

Benefits:-

  • The ability to construct a basic webpage using HTML and CSS
  • The basic HTML elements, such as paragraphs, tables, images, links and
    lists
  • The methods used to style HTML elements using CSS
  • An understanding of how JavaScript is used to implement backend
    programming logic

data.title: Core Java Course
data.course_desc:

Master Internshala Trainings' Java basics and concepts of Object Oriented Programming and develop an awesome game!

data.title: Digital Marketing Course with Guaranteed Internship
data.course_desc:
Enroll in Internshala Trainings' Digital Marketing Course with Guaranteed Internship and build your career in a guaranteed way. Become an ace digital marketer - Learn Google Analytics, Google Ads, SEO, social media marketing, email marketing, and more.


Benefits:
1. Land guaranteed internship with min. ₹10,000/month stipend after graduation.
2. Get access to 50K+ companies and career planning sessions (resume building, mock interviews, etc).
3. 100% refund on the course fee if you don't get hired.
4. Hands-on practice by working on 8 projects.
5. Get 4 Industry-recognized certificates from HubSpot and Google.

data.title: Integrated Program in Data Science, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (IDMA – Full Time)
data.course_desc:
In this rapidly evolving, digitally driven economy, the way we interact with the world is changing every day. New innovations and technologies have made life simpler and more nuanced, all at the same time. Which is why the demand for emerging technologies like Big Data Analytics, AI/ML, Cybersecurity, IoT and Robotics is increasing rapidly. 
Hero Vired’s integrated program in Data Science, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence is designed to give you the right tools to become indispensable in the future that is driven by smart technologies and predictive analytics. With this program, you get to be at the forefront of innovation and become the thought leader and game changer the world needs.
The immersive full time course is designed to make you proficient in the industry standards of Python, R, Tableau, PowerBI, Azure, Excel, Tensorflow, PyTorch, SQL and KNIME.

data.title: Complete Linux Training E-Degree
data.course_desc:
Description :-

Linux is the most fundamental technology required by all real developers. It is required in almost all fields of Software engineering. Devops, Cloud , Full Stack and App developers must have working knowledge of Linux. With this e-degree, you will learn:

Key Highlights

  • 5 Comprehensive Modules
  • 40+ Linux Technologies
  • Detailed Program for Absolute Beginners
  • Certification exam preparation for LPIC & RedHat
  • Real-time Project Building & Quizzes
  • Build a Strong foundation for Excellent Career Opportunities
  • Mentor Support & Help

data.title: Ethical hacking Course
data.course_desc:
Learn Internshala Trainings' Ethical Hacking Course to hack and secure websites like an expert. Learning how to hack can help you implement the strongest possible security practices. It's as much about finding and fixing security vulnerabilities as it is about anticipating them. Learning about the methods hackers use to infiltrate systems will help you resolve issues before they become dangerous

Course Highlights
-Learn online, at your own schedule
-Mobile friendly - No laptop? No problem
-Placement assistance to build your career
-Certificate of training from Internshala Trainings
-72 hacking challenges & 1 project to help you practice hacking
-Doubt clearing through Q&A forum

3. Lucrative salary: The average salary of a Cybersecurity Analyst is 6.8 LPA+ according to Indeed.

data.title: Certificate Program in Business Strategy
data.course_desc:
Xavier Institute of Management & Research, Mumbai is a premier Jesuit business school, part of the world's largest education network, spanning across continents. In India, the network includes XLRI, Xavier University, Bhubaneswar and LIBA, Chennai. XIMR was established in 2006 and is consistently ranked amongst the top business schools in Maharashtra, India. The intensive General Management program would include and focus on key elements of strategy in the organizational context. Participants from across functions in an organization can benefit by getting a holistic perspective of organizational strategy in their business context

Benefits :-

  • It allows organizations to be proactive rather than reactive.
  • It sets up a sense of direction.
  • It increases operational efficiency.
  • It helps to increase market share and profitability.
  • It can make a business more durable.

data.title: Python Course
data.course_desc:
Internshala Trainings’ Python course is a beginner-friendly course aimed to help you master one of the most popular programming languages of the 21st century. 
Python is an in-demand, accessible programming language with an active, ever-growing community of users. For anyone looking to switch careers into the tech world through coding, Python is a great place to start. It’s relatively easy to learn and incredibly versatile, and it’s used in a variety of fields, from data science and machine learning to game design. 

Course Highlights
-Learn online, at your own schedule
-Mobile friendly - No laptop? No problem
-Placement assistance- To build your career
-Certificate of training from Internshala Trainings
-1 project & 5 assignments- For hands-on practice
-Doubt clearing through Q&A forum
-Beginner-friendly- No prior knowledge required

Why Learn Programming with Python?
1. Versatility: Machine Learning, AI, Web Development, Hacking, IoT, and more. Python is used everywhere.
2. Beginner friendly: A simple and powerful syntax makes Python one of the easiest languages to learn.
3. Be in demand: Python is the fastest growing language according to Stack Overflow with an average fresher salary of 5 LPA+ according to Glassdoor.
